about_the_game:
Tyler Warren brings us his 6th set of 50 monster battlers, with theme of “monster evolution.” Each of the battlers is presented in three stages of evolution. It’s time to add a fun new dynamic to your battler lineup by starting small, evolving, and evolving again!

Use them to evolve in battle, or create a family of monsters (mom, dad, babies), or stronger versions of the same monster, showing their faces as your game progresses! Artwork similar in style to Tyler’s growing library of colorful characters.



Features:

  • More than 50 unique battlers with matching face sets
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV
  • Included is a background screen overlay that can be applied over battlebacks to give them a stylized texture to match each battler
  • Each battler is also provided in an optional “soft-filtered” version
  • Add these to Tyler’s other battlers and fill your library with 300+ exciting characters for your next RPG Maker Project!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers: Monster Evolution" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers: Monster Evolution" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Tyler Warren brings us his 6th set of 50 monster battlers, with theme of “monster evolution.” Each of the battlers is presented in three stages of evolution. It’s time to add a fun new dynamic to your battler lineup by starting small, evolving, and evolving again!

Use them to evolve in battle, or create a family of monsters (mom, dad, babies), or stronger versions of the same monster, showing their faces as your game progresses! Artwork similar in style to Tyler’s growing library of colorful characters.

  • More than 50 unique battlers with matching face sets
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV
  • Included is a background screen overlay that can be applied over battlebacks to give them a stylized texture to match each battler
  • Each battler is also provided in an optional “soft-filtered” version
  • Add these to Tyler’s other battlers and fill your library with 300+ exciting characters for your next RPG Maker Project!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects

* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution
